name: FSF Corporate Ship Blueprints
desc: A package of FSF starships blueprints commonly found in most heavy industry outputs.

name: FSF Internal Ship Blueprints
desc: A package of bluprints for rare starships designed by FSF that can be produced in heavy industry.

name: S-1 Cruise Missile
desc: The S-1 Cruise Missile is a special missile that uses the hull of a frigate for long range flight, allowing a fleet carrying them to conduct long-range attacks on enemy fleets without engaging. Its payload uses a large number of shrapnel warheads that when detonated, scatters into a large scattered wave of plasma that melts enemy armour over a wide area. After launch, it will automatically search for the nearest hostile fleet up to 60 degrees ahead.

name: S-2 Cruise Missile
desc: The S-2 Cruise Missile is a special missile that uses the hull of a frigate for long range flight, allowing a fleet carrying them to conduct long-range attacks on enemy fleets without engaging. It is capable of breaking through enemy fleet defences at high speed and then destroying specific point targets with precision. After launch, it will automatically search for the nearest hostile fleet up to 60 degrees ahead.
